hed: From Mister Rogers to Kurt: Guys in Cardigans Through the Years
dek: The cardigan might have the stigma of being a bit ordinary, but why then have so many stylish and interesting men adopted the staple and made it their own? The fall layer has been worn from chunky to thin, and in every neutral imaginable, by Hollywood and the music industry’s leading names for decades. Buy one this fall and wear it with confidence—as these thirteen guys prove, that’s the ideal combination.

items.title: Kurt Cobain, 1993
items.caption: Kurt and his green cardigan are the epitome of ‘90s grunge.

items.title: David Beckham, 2012
items.caption: Beckham is nailing that whole athletic-guy-in-a-sweater thing.

items.title: Johnny Carson, 1965
items.caption: Carson looks very much like a boss in his cardi and crisp white shirt.

items.title: Daniel Craig, 2009
items.caption: With style like this, it’s no wonder why Craig was chosen to play James Bond.

items.title: John Hamm as Don Draper in *Mad Men*, 1960s, circa 2014
items.caption: Looking like a millionaire boss on his day off is never a bad thing.

items.title: Clint Eastwood, 1961
items.caption: A polo looks much less stuffy this way. Well played, Eastwood, well played.

items.title: Paul Newman, 1955
items.caption: If you’ve got a face like Newman's, why not frame it up right.

items.title: Jay-Z, 2009
items.caption: Monochromatic layers will always win you style points. Jay-Z knows this.

items.title: Steve McQueen, 1966
items.caption: Nothing says fall in the outdoors like a thick-ass, camel-color cardigan.

items.title: Pharrell, 2014
items.caption: You know, sometimes a leather jacket just feels too aggressive.

items.title: Mister Rogers, 1980
items.caption: Sure, he’s a character, but his preppy style isn’t half bad.

items.title: Ryan Reynolds, 2015
items.caption: Let it be known: Reynolds has a black belt in layering clothes.

items.title: Jeff Bridges as The Dude in *The Big Lebowski*, 1998
items.caption: When it comes to killer cardigans, The Dude abides.

socialTitle: From Mister Rogers to Kurt: Guys in Cardigans Through the Years
socialDescription: Because you're going to need one this fall.
